name: John Bolton
summary: Former National Security Advisor who called Trump a 'laughing fool' to world leaders and warned he's dangerous to democracy.

keyStatements.quote: It's another example why he's not fit to be president. If anybody wants to know what a Trump administration would look like, when he's pardoning the people who rioted on Jan. 6, I think that's all you need to know.
The damage he did in his first term was reparable. The damage in the second term would be irreparable.
Trump's a 'Laughing Fool' to World Leaders.

timeline.significance: Became Trump's third National Security Advisor
Detailed concerns about Trump's foreign policy decisions

credibility.background: Former U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations, veteran diplomat and foreign policy expert
positions: U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations (2005-2006)
Under Secretary of State for Arms Control and International Security (2001-2005)
